parts.text:
[
  {
    "id": "window_title_bar",
    "type": "window_title_bar",
    "text": "Sem título 1 — LibreOffice Writer",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "meta": {
      "application_name": "LibreOffice Writer",
      "document_name": "Sem título 1"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "window_control_minimize",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Minimizar",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "window_control_maximize_restore",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Maximizar/Restaurar",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "window_control_close",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Fechar",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_arquivo",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Arquivo",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick", "onHover"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_editar",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Editar",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick", "onHover"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_exibir",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Exibir",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick", "onHover"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_inserir",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Inserir",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick", "onHover"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_formatar",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Formatar",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick", "onHover"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_estilos",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Estilos",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick", "onHover"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_tabela",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Tabela",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick", "onHover"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_formulario",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Formulário",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick", "onHover"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_ferramentas",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Ferramentas",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick", "onHover"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_janela",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Janela",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick", "onHover"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_ajuda",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Ajuda",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick", "onHover"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_new",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Novo",
    "icon": "document_new",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_open",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Abrir",
    "icon": "folder_open",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_save",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Salvar",
    "icon": "save",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_save_as",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Salvar como",
    "icon": "save_as",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_print",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Imprimir",
    "icon": "print",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_print_preview",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Visualizar impressão",
    "icon": "print_preview",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_cut",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Recortar",
    "icon": "cut",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_copy",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Copiar",
    "icon": "copy",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_paste",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Colar",
    "icon": "paste",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_format_painter",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Pincel de formatação",
    "icon": "format_painter",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_undo",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Desfazer",
    "icon": "undo",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_redo",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Refazer",
    "icon": "redo",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_find_replace",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Localizar e substituir",
    "icon": "find_replace",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_navigator",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Navegador",
    "icon": "navigator",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_spelling_grammar",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Ortografia e gramática",
    "icon": "spelling_grammar",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_show_hide_non_printing",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Mostrar/Ocultar caracteres não imprimíveis",
    "icon": "show_hide_non_printing",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_zoom_dropdown",
    "type": "dropdown",
    "text": "Zoom",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onSelect"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_help",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Ajuda",
    "icon": "help",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard_options",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Opções",
    "icon": "options",
    "region": "toolbar-standard",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_paragraph_style",
    "type": "dropdown",
    "text": "Estilo de parágrafo Padrão",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "actions": ["onSelect"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "Estilo de parágrafo Padrão"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_styles_formatting",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Estilos e formatação",
    "icon": "styles_formatting",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_clear_direct_formatting",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Limpar formatação direta",
    "icon": "clear_formatting",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_font_name",
    "type": "dropdown",
    "text": "Arial",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "actions": ["onSelect"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "Arial"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_font_size",
    "type": "dropdown",
    "text": "12 pt",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "actions": ["onSelect"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "12 pt"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_bold",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Negrito",
    "icon": "bold",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "active",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_italic",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Itálico",
    "icon": "italic",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_underline",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Sublinhado",
    "icon": "underline",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_strikethrough",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Tachado",
    "icon": "strikethrough",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_superscript",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Sobrescrito",
    "icon": "superscript",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_subscript",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Subscrito",
    "icon": "subscript",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_font_color",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Cor da fonte",
    "icon": "font_color",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "meta": {
      "current_color_indicator": "red"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_highlight_color",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Cor do realce",

    "region": "toolbar-formatting",

    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "meta": {
      "current_color_indicator": "red"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_align_left",

    "region": "toolbar-formatting",

    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_center",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Centralizar",
    "icon": "center",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_align_right",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Alinhar à direita",
    "icon": "align_right",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_justify",

    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",

  },

    "id": "toolbar_formatting_bulleted_list",

    "region": "toolbar-formatting",

  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_numbered_list",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Lista numerada",
    "icon": "numbered_list",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_decrease_indent",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Diminuir recuo",
    "icon": "decrease_indent",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_increase_indent",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Aumentar recuo",
    "icon": "increase_indent",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_line_spacing",
    "type": "dropdown",
    "text": "Espaçamento de linha",
    "icon": "line_spacing",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "actions": ["onSelect"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_background_color",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Cor de fundo",
    "icon": "background_color",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "meta": {
      "current_color_indicator": "black"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_borders",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Bordas",
    "icon": "borders",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting_more_options",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Mais opções",
    "icon": "more_options",
    "region": "toolbar-formatting",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "horizontal_ruler",
    "type": "ruler",
    "text": null,
    "region": "ruler",
    "meta": {
      "orientation": "horizontal",
      "units": "cm",
      "range": "0-18"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "document_area",
    "type": "text_editor",
    "text": null,
    "region": "main-content",
    "meta": {
      "placeholder": "Comece a digitar...",
      "cursor_position": "start"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_header_properties_label",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "Propriedades",
    "region": "sidebar-header"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_header_help_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "?",
    "region": "sidebar-header",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_header_close_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "x",
    "region": "sidebar-header",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_header_menu_button",
    "type": "button",

    "icon": "hamburger_menu",
    "region": "sidebar-header",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_properties",
    "type": "tab",
    "text": "Propriedades",
    "icon": "properties",
    "region": "sidebar-tabs",
    "state": "selected",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_gallery",
    "type": "tab",
    "text": "Galeria",
    "icon": "gallery",
    "region": "sidebar-tabs",
    "state": "default",

  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_navigator",
    "type": "tab",

    "icon": "navigator",
    "region": "sidebar-tabs",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_styles",

    "region": "sidebar-tabs",
    "state": "default",

  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_manage_changes",

    "id": "sidebar_tab_customize",

    "id": "sidebar_tab_search",

    "actions": ["onClick"]

  {
    "id": "sidebar_section_style",

    "region": "sidebar-content",
    "state": "expanded",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_style_paragraph_style_dropdown",

      "current_value": "Estilo de parágrafo Padrão"

  {
    "id": "sidebar_style_properties_button",

  {
    "id": "sidebar_character_font_size_input",

    "actions": ["onChange", "onIncrement", "onDecrement"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "12 pt",
      "unit": "pt"

  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_character_bold",
    "type": "button",

    "icon": "bold",

  },

    "id": "sidebar_character_italic",

    "region": "sidebar-content",

  },

    "id": "sidebar_character_strikethrough",

    "region": "sidebar-content",
    "state": "default",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_character_superscript",

    "region": "sidebar-content",
    "state": "default",

  },
